title: eScan AntiVirus Toolkit (MWAV) v12.0.8 [ML]
description:
eScan AntiVirus Toolkit (MWAV) v12.0.8 [ML]

===========
::English::
===========
Language: Multi
Platform: Windows All
License: Freeware

eScan Antivirus Toolkit - a free utility that allows you to scan and remove viruses, spyware, adware and other malicious programs that could be infected computer. eScan Antivirus Toolkit does not require installation and can be run directly from anywhere: on your computer, USB media or CD. It can be started, even if your computer is already running another antivirus program.

eScan Antivirus Toolkit weekly updates to the latest version, for that would detect newly released spyware and adware in addition to this mechanism is constantly "improvises" a fast and smart detection.

Options eScan Antivirus Toolkit 12.x:
* Full Scan and clean your computer, as well as reporting on any detected viruses.
* Check and remove all programs, dialers from your computer.
* Checking and cleaning of any illegal traffic analyzer, or spyware, adware, keyloggers etc. running in the memory of your computer.
* You can add the program to the Startup list computer in order that she could scan and clean your computer with each new startup.
* When you download this program, you will get it together with the latest updated list of viruses that will scan and clean your computer from all known viruses.
* No installation required. Just download and run the eScan Antivirus Toolkit to scan your computer.
* EScan Antivirus Toolkit runs on Microsoft Windows 2000, XP, Vista, Windows 7 and Windows 2008 (Operating System 32 and 64 bit), and also supports multiple languages.
